title: Acupuncture
description: At the department of Psychiatry / Behavioral Health, we provide acupuncture services for an array of patients. Learn more.
cleaned_text: Acupuncture is a key component of traditional Chinese medicine involving the insertion of very thin needles through the skin at strategic points on the body. Acupuncture is most commonly used to alleviate pain or treat various health conditions. Acupuncture is increasingly being used to help patients with overall health and wellness, including stress management. Acupuncture Alternative medicine to treat overall wellness Proudly Serving: Carrollwood, and Wesley Chapel.
